sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import {
  Container,
  Typography,
  Box,
  Button,
  Grid,
  Card,
  CardContent,
  CardMedia,
  CardActions,
  Chip,
  Fade,
  Slide,
  Grow,
  Paper,
  Avatar
} from '@mui/material';
import {
  AutoStories,
  TrendingUp,
  LocalShipping,
  Star,
  People,
  Favorite,
  ArrowForward
} from '@mui/icons-material';
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext';
import BookCarousel from '../components/BookCarousel';
import { featuredBooks, getBooksByCategory } from '../data/booksData';

const Home = () => {
  const { isAuthenticated, user } = useAuth();

  const featuredBooks = [
    {
      id: 1,
      title: "The Great Gatsby",
      author: "F. Scott Fitzgerald",
      price: 299,
      image: "https://via.placeholder.com/200x300?text=Book+1"
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      title: "To Kill a Mockingbird",
      author: "Harper Lee",
      price: 399,
      image: "https://via.placeholder.com/200x300?text=Book+2"
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      title: "1984",
      author: "George Orwell",
      price: 349,
      image: "https://via.placeholder.com/200x300?text=Book+3"
    }
  ];

  return (
    <Container maxWidth="lg">
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Box
        sx={{
          bgcolor: 'primary.main',
          color: 'white',
          py: 8,
          px: 4,
          borderRadius: 2,
          textAlign: 'center',
          mb: 6,
          mt: 4
        }}
      >
        <Typography variant="h2" component="h1" gutterBottom>
          Welcome to Our Bookstore
          {isAuthenticated && user && (
            <Typography variant="h4" component="span" sx={{ display: 'block', mt: 2 }}>
              Hello, {user.firstName}!
            </Typography>
          )}
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="h5" paragraph>
          Discover amazing books and expand your knowledge
        </Typography>
        <Button
          variant="contained"
          color="secondary"
          size="large"
          component={Link}
          to="/products"
          sx={{ mt: 2 }}
        >
          Browse Books
        </Button>
      </Box>

      {/* Featured Books Section */}
      <Box sx={{ mb: 6 }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" component="h2" gutterBottom align="center">
          Featured Books
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={4} sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
          {featuredBooks.map((book) => (
            <Grid item key={book.id} xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
              <Card sx={{ height: '100%', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }}>
                <CardMedia
                  component="img"
                  height="300"
                  image={book.image}
                  alt={book.title}
                />
                <CardContent sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
                  <Typography gutterBottom variant="h6" component="h3">
                    {book.title}
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                    by {book.author}
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="h6" color="primary" sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
                    â‚¹{book.price}
                  </Typography>
                </CardContent>
                <CardActions>
                  <Button 
                    size="small" 
                    component={Link} 
                    to={`/products/${book.id}`}
                  >
                    View Details
                  </Button>
                  {isAuthenticated && (
                    <Button size="small" color="primary">
                      Add to Cart
                    </Button>
                  )}
                </CardActions>
              </Card>
            </Grid>
          ))}
        </Grid>
      </Box>

      {/* Features Section */}
      <Box sx={{ py: 6, bgcolor: 'grey.100', borderRadius: 2, px: 4 }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" component="h2" gutterBottom align="center">
          Why Choose Our Bookstore?
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={4} sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Box textAlign="center">
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                Wide Selection
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">
                Thousands of books across all genres and categories
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Box textAlign="center">
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                Fast Delivery
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">
                Quick and reliable delivery to your doorstep
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Box textAlign="center">
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                Best Prices
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">
                Competitive prices and regular discounts
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Box>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default Home;
